Title: The Wastrel
Writer: Suso Cecchi D'Amico, Mihalis Kakogiannis, Frederic Wakeman (novel)
Actors: Ellie Lambeti, Van Heflin, Franco Fabrizi, Fosco Giachetti
Plot: A wealthy and self-serving man, sets out on a perilous ocean voyage with his son. An unexpected incident with the vessel causes him to reflect on his not so perfect life.
